state_summary: Investors share what to remember while raising a Series A, emphasizing founder quality, market potential, and product-market fit.
evidence: Fewer rounds are getting funded but deal sizes have grown
GV uses a specific formula to evaluate companies, examining demand patterns to ensure every quarter outperforms the last
Most companies should not pursue venture-scale growth
keywords: Series A, investors, startup, funding, market potential, founder quality, product-market fit

metadata.investor_name: Thomas Green, Katie Stanton, Sangeen Zeb
